title: Balancing Privacy and Scalability: Arbitrum's Role in Decentralized Technologies
description: Explore how Arbitrum enhances Ethereum's scalability while addressing privacy issues in decentralized networks. Delve into the role of Optimistic Rollups, privacy innovations, and regulatory considerations in achieving a balance between transparency and security.
keywords: Arbitrum, Ethereum, blockchain, layer-2 scaling, privacy, scalability, Optimistic Rollups, Zero-Knowledge Proofs, decentralized networks, regulatory landscape
